title: Хит
overview: "Hit" is a documentary project from Wink Originals about music. It will tell you why songs become hits and how music can influence entire eras. Vanya Dmitrienko, Shura, IOWA, FEDUK, Yulia Savicheva, Valeria, Fedor Bondarchuk and many others took part in the project. The audience will see how the clips were created, evaluate archival recordings from the filming, and hear the first versions of the hits. The creators of the series will tell about the history of pop music in the format of five-year plans, and at the end of the series they will record a small album with the biggest hits in the entire history of Russian pop: hits of the 90s and beyond are already waiting for you.
